name: Annabelle Escape
description: Annabelle Escape is the new scary escape game. A complete fear arousing game and a range of premium scary game to meet all your suspense exiting feels, your journey in this game is to save a father and son being caught inside the graveyard haunted place, exclusive range of objects and clues are given for you to solve, there are some freaky faces to be collected and placed on to the space given, hope you finally find the key to unlock the gate for them to escape,
